page.title: 07Local Magazine / Monks Kirby
page.content:
The local magazine is called{"Round {the Revel".}It is a free magazine given to all the households in Monks Kirby, Brinklow, Pailton, Withybrook and Stretton-under-Fosse.It is a magazine that tells of all the coming events in that month.Each of the villages mentioned have their own page on which people can write letters about things concerning their village.It always starts with an introduction by the local vicar.The magazine includes a special page for children called{"Kids Page"}which contains puzzles and jokes for example:_
{What two coins add up to 70p ,one {is not a 20p ? or:_ { How did the octopus go to battle ? { Answer:_ Fully armed.
